text: Brand New was an American rock band. The band was from Long Island, New York. It was made in 2000. The band's members were Jesse Lacey (singing, guitar), Vincent Accardi (guitar, singing), Garrett Tierney (bass guitar, singing) and Brian Lane (drums). From 2005 to 2013, Derrick Sherman (guitar, keyboard, singing) was also in the band. Lacey, Tierney and Lane played music in the band Rookie Lot before making Brand New. They made the band with Accardi in 2000. They joined Triple Crown Records, and made their first album in 2001. It was named Your Favorite Weapon. Their second album was Deja Entendu. Many music critics liked this album. It was different from their first album.[ "Deja EntenduBrand New"]. AllMusic. Retrieved 2010-10-17. Later, the band joined Interscope Records. This was a larger record label. The band's first album to reach the number one spot on the Billboard 200 was Science Fiction (2017). == Studio albums == * Your Favorite Weapon (2001) * Deja Entendu (2003) * The Devil and God Are Raging Inside Me (2006) * Daisy (2009) * Science Fiction (2017) == References == Category:Alternative rock bands Category:Emo bands Category:Musical groups established in 2000
title: Brand New (band)
